name: Masked Words
description:
Masked Words is a prototype DreamSMP dating-sim visual novel where... well words are masked! Use the mouse to remove a strip of tape to change the outcome of the story~ 

There are 3 endings! Can you get them all?

Submitted to the 2nd Vtuber Game Jam with the theme "Masked"!

If you enjoyed this game, consider following me on Twitter and Twitch! 

Changelog:

v1.0 - Jam Release

  • Released to critical acclaim with over 1 time played! 🎉
